mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hay, George, 1765-1830
mdRecord.dcterms:description: George Hay, "Oak Hill," Loudon (sic) Co., Va., to Lloyd Nicholas Rogers, Baltimore, Maryland. News on the failing health of Mr. Monroe, who is in Richmond; gives Monroe's decision to resign his seat at the Convention Virginia Constitutional Convention, 1829-1830; and the need for Mrs. Eliza Hay to go to her father. 2 pages. Autograph letter signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: George Hay to Lloyd Nicholas Rogers, December 17, 1829
